Description:
Adversaries may abuse PowerShell commands and scripts for execution.
PowerShell is a powerful interactive command-line interface and scripting environment included in the Windows operating system. (Citation: TechNet PowerShell)
Adversaries can use PowerShell to perform a number of actions, including discovery of information and execution of code


Author: frack113
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Powershell XML Execute Command
Query: sourcetype like 'windows-%' eql select * from _source_ where ((scriptblocktext like '%new-object%' and scriptblocktext like '%system.xml.xmldocument%' and scriptblocktext like '%.load%') and (scriptblocktext like '%iex %' or scriptblocktext like '%invoke-expression %' or scriptblocktext like '%invoke-command %' or scriptblocktext like '%icm -%'))
